tool_description: IDfy’s IBBI Verification API will enable you to understand if an Indian corporation is under bankruptcy.
title: India Bankruptcy Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: India Bankruptcy Verification
api_list.description:
IBBI or Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India was established on 1st October, 2016 under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016 (Code). It is a key pillar that is responsible for implementation of the Code that consolidates and amends the laws relating to reorganization and insolvency resolution of corporate persons, partnership firms and individuals in a time bound manner. IDfy’s IBBI Verification API will enable you to understand if the corporation is under bankruptcy.

Use GET Call API to fetch results, using request id received in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-bankruptcy-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_ibbi_verify"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-bankruptcy-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
